Made time for appointment.

resp.text: Hi Mr. Duke I am so sorry that we found it necessary to cancel the appointment. We do not cancel appointments lightly. The appointment was scheduled by mistake as we do not offer the product you are looking for. The designer caught the error when she was reviewing her appointments for the day. As she said in her text to you, we do not offer screens. She felt it was best to let you know as soon as she had discovered the error. She used text instead of a call due to the early hour. Also, we have found text is the best way to communicate with the majority of our customers. Again, I am sorry that did not work for you. I hope you find the screens you need. text: Phil was amazing! Helped us select the perfect blinds for our master bedroom with four giant windows and french doors. The finished look is beautiful and just what we wanted. The process was easy from requesting an inital visit through to installaion. Phil is friendly, courteous, communicative, timely, and most of all a joy to work with. I fully receommend Budget Blinds of Baldwin County.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Lundy Wilder
text:
Ask for Alex ! The others at Budget Blinds may be great also but I KNOW that Alex is !  I finally had my home-made goofy shades in my bedroom replaced with beautiful sleek roller shades. Alex was great at helping me find some that blocked most of the hot summer sun but allowed me to see the trees and what was going on outside. The color is a perfect match for my walls and it turned out to be the less costly line they carry, which was a bonus.
Alex is punctual and returns calls and took my old plastic straw shades off to put in their recycle bin and he removed all packaging when he left.
He has a great attitude and is a pleasure to be around. Great experience all around.

name: Lindsay Pileggi
text: Budget Blinds is the best!  I was contacted within a day of submitting a Request Online through their website.  They set up an appointment with a Consultant to meet at my house.  The Consultant Phillip was on time, friendly, professional, and very knowledgeable.  He was able to go through the various options of Blinds available for purchase, and gave me comparisons on pricing and quality of each selection.  Working with Budget Blinds was the best experience.  And the best part, Pricing was not outrageous!  Why try to hunt someone down at your local hardware store?  Call Budget Blinds and let them come to you.  It's so easy!  I will be contacting them again when I'm ready to get blinds for my sun room.

name: Sandy Bookout
text:
We have used Budget Blinds in Birmingham several times. So, when we moved to Gulf Shores I went in search of a Budget Blinds close by. And there they were! We have used them twice here and both times have had a wonderful experience. They are easy to schedule an appointment with and they always show up on time. The sales reps are knowledgeable  and very easy to work with. On the day of the install it was pouring down rain. They came to my door, took off their shoes, and got right to work. Wonderful team! Wonderful product. Thanks!
Sandy B.

name: Sean Ferrell
text: We have used Budget Blinds multiple times. We love the woven shades in our home so much, we decided to use their products again in our office! Val has awesome knowledge of their products, and recommended a perfect treatment for our windows in our budget! Their customer service and installation team go above and beyond with their kindness and professionalism. We will definitely use them again!

name: Jane Breaux
text: Highly recommend BB for all your window covering needs! I really enjoyed working with highly competent design specialist Phil Duke who was able to help me select the PERFECT style of drapes and blinds without breaking my budget, and perfect installation of them too! They took plenty of time with me, no high pressure sales, and let me decide what was best for the space! I look forward to working with Phil and BB again in the future for more great blinds!

name: Chi EK
text: Very professional and competent at their job. Our blinds were hung with the utmost care and concern. We even received hands on review on how to take care of them, removal and putting back if and when necessary. Thank you for a job well done. We would use them again.

text: Shopped quite a bit looking for professionalism, price, and quality.  Look no further.  Budget Blinds has a superior product and team.  Alex consulted us on the right blinds and shutters, and personally installed them.  They not only look great, they really set the look of the house off.  Hats off to Alex and the whole Budget Blind Staff!

text: Awesome furniture and lighting. It’s a little pricey but great quality. The only downside to this location is that it is quite small with not much to see on display. There weren’t many employees available to offer assistance or answer questions. I highly recommend visiting the multi level Nashville location if you want a better experience.

name: SantanaTyree
text:
SAVE YOURSELF THE TIME AND DO NOT GO HERE. See below:

The customer service was absolutely awful. If you are looking for a warm, inviting environment, RH at the Summit isn’t the place whatsoever. You will be completely disappointed if you receive the treatment we did. You will especially be disappointed and appalled if you had just left Bassett Furniture in Hoover where they took the time to do the following: cultivate a relationship, show you around their showroom, listen to what your needs are, and sit down to customize furniture based on your specifications. For lack of words, the feeling that my husband and I received at RH: “We are RH, our products speak for themselves, so we are not going to do our job at all. We are not going to try to educate them on our selections/options. I am not leaving my computer to assess their needs. If they want something, they’ll ask me then buy it.” The ONLY information we were given was about looking online and a RH book when we got ready to leave because I couldn’t take it any longer. Not once did the lady offer to look at fabrics with us, to go over color selections, discuss what their process was, etc. (We were wanting custom furniture for a spec home and this was stated.) When I asked a question, the response was very much short and NON-informative, I was told to look online which defeats the entire purpose of going in store. The lack of willingness to assist us has left a LASTING impression. Because of that, we are HAPPY to spend MORE elsewhere because of superb customer service. There are numerous competitors; a product can easily be mimicked, customer service can’t.

name: Vicki Dukes
text: I had been looking for a table and chairs for my kitchen. Found what I wanted online. I wasn’t ready to order, though, without seeing it. My husband and I made the 1.5 hour trip to Bham. I had talked to Loren on the phone before I came. When we got there, Loren helped us. She was very professional and knew what she was talking about. It was a very good experience.

name: Brian Panos
text: Nice stuff but pricey!

name: Jennifer Jones
text: Thank God for Rebekah!! I visited RH for the first time on 10/26 during my quick little birthday getaway. This was actually my first time EVER visiting an RH store. Rebekah greeted me enthusiastically. She was so nice and personable as she engaged with me and answered any and all questions that I had. I really enjoyed chatting with her. She was very cheerful, bubbly, and helpful. I really didn't sense the same vibe from the other few associates I saw standing around in the store. The guy who greeted me at the door was also warm ams and inviting. Thank you soooo much Rebekah for being so friendly and kind!!! Little did she know, I had just lost one of my closest friends to Covid-19 who was buried just that Saturday before. So, I was out and about trying to enjoy my birthday in spite of. This was my first visit to the Summit, and Rebekah was one the best experiences I had that day. She really need to spend time over at Saks and Seasons 52 training some of the sales associates and waiters on good customer service and how to demonstrate it. God bless you Rebekah!!

text: Bought a cloud with terrible cushions that don’t hold their fill just after a single use.   There is no way a cushion should have to be disconnected and fluffed every single time.    Now they told me that it would cost $1400 to replace them to cushions  that will hold their shape.   Extremely disappointed with a multi million dollar company that can’t remedy a simple problem.

name: Susan Hanley
text: If you could assign less than one star I certainly would. I just spent over 20 minutes in Restoration Hardware at the Summit waiting for someone to wait on me (or even speak to me) and obviously they do not need my business because they did not even acknowledge me although they looked over at me several times. There were three sales associates and at the very beginning they were each with someone but then one became available when her customer left and she immediately disappeared to the back of the store. Again keep in mind they all saw me and said nothing and when the sales rep  finally came back out from wherever she went, another person  walked into the store and she asked if she could help them. Wow! I wanted to purchase a king bedroom suite I saw in their catalog which would have been well over a $10k purchase but I guess they do not need my business. I’m taking it somewhere that someone will actually acknowledge you  walked into their store.

She wanted to look up my address so I gave it to her, she says nothing came up and then she repeats again that they do not repair any one else’s blinds. Ok, so since I don’t know who, what’s wrong with charging a service charge to come repair or get a sale on new blinds. Very poor customer service and what business turns away a new paying customer.

Great quality workmanship, and the communication processes, as well as the installation team...everything was just PERFECT!!!  I could not be any more pleased with Custom Blinds & Shutters! Totally recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you! You are very kind.

name: chris eddins
text: I cannot say enough good things about the quality and service I received from Custom Blinds.  The plantation blinds are beautiful, the installation was perfect, and everyone I dealt with was awesome!

resp.text: Thank you! We appreciate you.

name: Randy M
text: Mr Byram’s company is truly a first class operation and top-tiered. His products are well built, clean, modern, and a pleasant design. His & his team’s customer service are the best I have encountered in quite some time. His measurements are engineering level accurate. His install team is professional, personable, & trustworthy. The products are very affordable despite the high-end quality. One could spend more on blinds...but why???

resp.text: Thank you Randy. We appreciate the trust you put in us to make and install the shutters in your home. You and Angie were a joy to work with.

name: angelisa Baker
text: Custom Blinds build me some amazing Plantation Shutters! They are something that improves the quality of my home. The guys that came to do the work were courteous and fast to boot! Everyone should use Custom Blinds!

resp.text: You are very kind. Thank you for allowing us to do shutters in your home.

name: Nicole Milam
text: Wonderful quality, great prices, great customer service. I love my shutters!

resp.text: Thank you Nicole. You have been a pleasure to work with.

name: Chris Taylor
text: Craig and his team do an excellent job. From picking out the treatments to install, the service is top notch. The beautiful plantation shutters transformed the look of our new home. Highly recommend you call them before making a decision.

resp.text: Thank you Chris. I appreciate you and Marci trusting us to provide your shutters in your new home.

name: Carey Tuck
text: We love the new shade in our office and our shutters in our home.  I have recommended Custom Blinds & Shutters to several friends and family members. Their installation is super fast and clean. The installers are very timely and professional.  Owner, Craig Byram, is the BEST!!!  No need to look any further for your shutter, blinds or shade needs..... choose Custom Blinds and Shutters today!!!

resp.text: Thank you for sharing your positive experience. We value the people who trust us to do things in there homes and businesses. Thank you for the confidence you put in us by referring us to your family and friends.

name: Stephanie Ayers
text: Absolutely love our new shutters! They really complete our new room and look wonderful! Thank you so much!

resp.text: I appreciate you and Lane trusting us to complete the new addition to your home.

name: Allison Strickland
text: Professional, friendly, fair and honest. We had a fantastic experience! Thanks for such great work!

resp.text: Thank you for the compliment. It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Laura Averette
text: I love my shutters! I have recommended Custom Blinds & Shutters to several friends and family members. Their installation is super fast and clean. The installers are very timely and incredibly respectful. Their prices are great!

name: al yother
text: We have used Custom Blinds & Shutters on several occasions for shades (both indoor and outdoor) and for window tinting and have always been pleased.  Our last purchase of outdoor shades required a creative installation solution to prevent the shades from blowing wildly in a strong wind and it really works.  Having these shades has really extended the time we can be outside on our porch whereas in the past the angle of the afternoon sun made it so bright and hot that it was unbearable to be outside. Good products, good price, and good people.

resp.text: We are so happy with the result as well! Thank you for your business; we look forward to working with you again soon!

name: judith summerford
text: Craig has just installed new shutters for me.  They look great and the workmanship is perfect.  Nice to work with someone who delivers on time and does a great job of installing and cleaning up behind themselves.

resp.text: We are so glad you love them! We were thrilled with how the painted shutters turned out!

name: Kathy Grate
text: Great experience. Professional and efficient. So happy with the results. Entire house of new blinds installed in less than one hour. I definitely recommend.

resp.text: Hi Kathy, We are SO happy that you love your new blinds! Thank you for the opportunity to work with you! We are here when you need us. Thanks, Craig

name: J. Jackson
text: Craig and his team have put blinds and shutters in our last 2 houses.  Their products and service are second to none.  We have also been able to refer him multiple times and each time has been a success.  Would not hesitate to use him again.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words. We value your confidence in us.

name: Jimmy Stewart
text: Craig with Custom Blinds did an awesome job with our shutters. The off white color he chose matched our trim perfectly. The measurements were spot on too. You will not be disappointed doing business with this company.

resp.text: We are thrilled that you love your shutters! Thank you for your business; we look forward to working with you again.

name: Brannon Dawkins
text: I have used Custom Blinds & Shutters many times and I am always 100 percent happy. Owner Craig Byram is professional, knowledgeable and reliable and so are his employees. I would never use anyone else for blinds and shutters in my home!

resp.text: Brannon, thanks so much for your kind words!  We appreciate your business! - Craig

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words and your business.

resp.text: We appreciate and thank you for your kind words.

text:
This place is very beautiful. It's well lit. Like.. Very well lit. I love the candles, lights and fixtures. I had some fun rearranging the mugs 😂 😂 this place is a great inspiration for things I will build and design myself.
I was with someone who had to return a defective item (ordered online) and it was handled very well. I definitely recommend shopping here :)

name: chaymae touizi
text:
Do not buy their beds, we bought a set from these guys and after it came we noticed wholes and came to find out it was some type of termite, they replaced the first time and same problem occurred the with that same bed ( we have bought 3 from them) and when I reach out they tell me it’s out of warranty, not our problem, you should dispose of it.
Yes, spent 1600$ for a bed that lasted exactly 1year 6 months !

name: Pat Richard
text: Very clean with beautiful stuff.  Wish I could buy.  Love the place.

name: Black Lotus Boutique
text: Nice store but the workers are very nasty. Several times I have been in this store only to walk in and be ignoted not even a hello may i help you. I am so sorry I am not dressed up in heelsholding a Gucci or Coach bag! Very disappointing that you treat potential customers who may have come in to make a purchase. I have walked out all these times because of this one thing calles "ACKNOWLEDGEMENT". Iknow these workers do not live in a multi million dollar home but what gives them the right to act all high and mighty. Each time i have gone thinking maybe this time someone will at least say "Hello, welcome. Is thier anything I can help you with?" Nothing! You have no idea whether people have money to spend there or not and refardless you should treat people with cimmon courtesy. It is not alot to ask. Meanwhile about 4 stores down at Williams and Sinoma they are extremely friendly. Shame on you for your snotty attitudes.

name: Avalisha Fisher
text: Still requiring masks months after the mandate was lifted

name: Helen H. Gonzalez
text: The day of, the associate called and confirmed and asked if I could have the space cleared for a more efficient delivery. I did just that! But after I had donated my old room furniture, I received a call stating I would not get my new furniture due to the delivery truck breaking down. I was livid because I have a fully breastfed 8 month old and we now have to sleep on the floor. Surely I couldn't feed her in the middle of the night on a sofa. After explaining that to the manager he simply said "well, things happen". He did not offer any extra assistance. I offered to pick up the furniture myself and have 2 gentlemen ride with me to put it together because I was the last delivery for the day. I brainstormed solutions and he simply said no. He did not offer compensation for my inconvenience, NOTHING. The day of the delivery, the young man delivering my furniture was very sweet, professional and because I could not be there to observe their proficiency and accuracy,

text: Really nice things for your home

name: Kevlar Richardson
text: I feel very pretty when I shop here.

name: Karen Landrum
text: I’ve never needed to order draperies before & I was looking in the Yellow Pages & found Western Draperies.  I asked the gentleman who answered the phone if they made block out draperies & he said yes.  The rest was history as Mary came out & made some measurements in my “hot box” bedroom.  I’ve been on my own since I was 21 & moved out of this house ever since.  Mama passed away & she loved lacy valances & mini blinds but it was too hot in this front bedroom.  I moved back in as I knew it would benefit both daddy & I.  But the sun came in fast & furious & I sleep better when it’s dark.  Mary was very personable & definitely knew what she was doing.  My draperies are beautiful!!  And they work so very well w/blocking out that sun that baked me in the early morning.  Her husband was such a nice man & did a wonderful job installing my drapes.  I was like a kid in a candy store!! 👍🏼 💯% satisfied customer!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Karen! We really appreciate the review!

name: cash wilkerson
text:
Great... both Mary and Phil are true professionals ... magicians with the fabric.

Two big thumbs up.

resp.text: Cash, thanks for the nice review and for your business!

name: Mike Denton
text:
We were looking for someone to make a half circle window treatment (fanlight approx 3' x 6') for us, but found that no one did that kind of work anymore. It was the look we wanted. We were finally referred to Western Drapery in Homewood. They have a new vender who will make any shape frame you want from a template. After discussing the way fabric would go on the frame with the kind people at Western Drapery, we decided that we could do it ourselves as long as we had the frame. So after carefully measuring and creating the template, it was ordered, made, and shipped. We attached sheer fabric to get the star burst look we wanted to achieve and the end result was perfect. We couldn't have done it without Mary and her brother at Western Drapery and the company that made the form. They were both great to work with.

Mike and Randy Denton

resp.text: Thank you Mike for leaving the great review.  We appreciate your business and hope your window treatment is perfect for you.

name: Valerie Chavez
text: They do amazing work!!

name: Cameron al Shaqar
text: Tatiana at Calico Corners in Hoover is lovely! She is so knowledgeable and has helped me make my house just the way I wanted it. She is clear, concise, works within my budget, and an all-around fantastic decorator and person!

resp.text:
Hello Cameron,

Thank you for taking the time to complete our survey and for the 5 star rating! We are happy to hear that you had a great experience at our store with Tatiana, we will definitely let her know.. We look forward to working with you again very soon. Thank you - Vik

name: Julie King
text: Excellent service! Tatyana is like having your own designer- so talented and willing to help. The store is clean and organized, and again the customer service is fantastic. I won't be going to any other fabric stores- they have it all!

name: Merrilyn Cook
text: Great selection of fabrics and great service. Be sure to see Jeannie. She is wonderful!

name: Mary Jane Karwoski
text: Great service

name: Deirdre Taylor
text: I only go to home Depot if Lowe's doesn't have what I need, and that's rare. I always have a problem picking up orders. You can't just call in to have it brought to you by curbside because they claim to be too busy to get your information. When you go in, if the order is not in that little closet behind them, they'll just tell you it's not there rather than to go to the back and get it. I order a lot and never have a problem with Lowe's. It took an act of congress to finally get my complete order from Home Depot. One young lady, Kia went out of her way to help me and it wasn't even her department. Thanks to her I have everything. I only shop here when I absolutely have no choice.

name: Anithea M
text: Got in and got out! Found what I wanted on the app!

name: Liz R
text: Everything seems to be easy to locate. If you are using The Home Depot app most of their inventory counts are accurate or up-to-date for products on shelf

name: Silvery Nova
text: The first problem is the delivery service company that Home Depot uses for direct deliveries,Central Transport. My 1st initial delivery date changed three time before it was actually attempted to be delivered on March 3rd. On March 3rd the shipment came on a long bed truck with a pallet dolly. My shipment is a pallet of 33 boxes of porcelain tile., plus 7 additional boxes they put on the same pallet. The right side of the pallet was coming apart due to the immense weight of the tile . The driver could not move the pallet down the truck. He was not going to be able to pull it up the small slope on my driveway. What on earth were they even thinking?They needed a fork lift. I called Home Depot and they got the Transport company on the line while I was on hold. I ended up being told the transport company needed to take care of this and they would contact me in 24 to 48 hours. Which they never did. I had to call them. On 3/5 Friday I called central transport and they told me the shipment would be delivered on Monday between 11 and 12. They never showed. I checked the shipment tracking and found that they changed it to Tuesday 3/9! I got no call, text, or phone call.So Tuesday 3/9 I message them to find out eta. They said the drivers hadn't left yet and to keep checking they will update me. That never happened. So I wait and wait and I get a call from Home Depot letting me know the tile has arrived at THE STORE. I was never told anything about this.They will be delivering the tile on Monday 3/15....

name: Benny Woods
text: Really nice store they have just about anything you're looking for tools paint Lumber home appliances shingles sheetrock power tools tool boxes cement ceiling fans lawn mowers

name: Carolyn Ann Pitts
text: GREAT SALE PRICE ON OUR DISHWASHER WE GOT WELL THEY ORDERED IT AND WE WILL GET IT ON APRIL 23. SALES ASSOCIATE WAS VERY SWEET AND VERY HELPFUL. THANKS FOR SUCH A GREAT SALE

name: Cynthia James
text: Online order pickup inside store was super easy. Total transaction was about 3 min. I even had someone ask me if I needed something. Unfortunately that night I was only browsing  but Thanks to the lady working in the appliances department for actually engaging.

name: Tiffany Reed
text: Love home depot.. They had alot of stuff at decent prices and the employees were really friendly and helpful. They now have self checkout so checkout was a breeze too. It wasnt crowded and displays made things very easy to find on my own.

name: Sandra Cauley
text:
I went in the garden center and told girl at registry, that  I wanted 2 medium bags of Miracle-Gro potting soil, and help getting it n putting it in car.  No help came, then she told me go in back pick it up.  Finally realized she charged me for garden soil, I ask her to give me potting soil and charge me for the difference.  She said she couldn't, I had go customer service.  I told her I wasn't able, that why I parked out in front garden center and ask for help.  I told her I would eat the loss and never come there again.

I don't like be hard get long with, but it was her mistake, why should I have go customer service, when I have trouble walking that distance.  I will use Lowes from now on.

I'm a 100% Service Connected Disable Veteran.

name: K'Cee Ortiz
text: Came just to check out the garden center/plants selection. Very minimal, but prices are decent. If looking for a larger selection of flowering, herbs, or trees go to Lowe's. Home Depot's tropical plant section is good however.

name: Kathryn Brakefield
text: Clean ..well stocked..great customer service. Prefer Home Depot Mobile AL.  worth the drive from MS.

name: Michelle Williamson
text: Great service as always! Purchased a small metal gate for my flower bed to keep the dog out but didn't realize the poles that stake into the ground were missing. They found them straight away when I went back and made it stree free

name: Zash
text: Needed some rope but it was locked up behind glass. Could not find an employee to help. Asked the Paint Dept person to call us some assistance. Waited 10 more minutes but no one came. Hunted down someone again but they didnt know the combination to the lock that was gaurding the rope. Was in the store 30mins just for 10ft of rope!

name: melissa renee
text: The lady who sold us a washer and dryer was very nice no problems at all. I have a problem with the fact that they were supposed to be delivered at my house on April 21st. It got delayed so they moved the delivery date to Today ( April 24th ) but I never got any notification so I called and they told me that they don’t deliver to my area on saturdays, only Wednesdays and they don’t deliver when the weather is rainy. It’s been SUNNY all day. No bad weather AT ALL. Now the delivery date has been moved to May 12th. I will be giving birth in May so that’s really annoying 🙄 I ordered my washer and dryer on MARCH 3RD!!!  I hope the warehouse manager makes this right.

name: Jessie
text: Went to buy an appliance that I saw online. Called the this particular store literally on my way over there. Young lady told me that indeed they had the sale item which I was inquiring about. I get to the store and spoke with someone worker in appliances I ask him again to verify of what I wanted. He walks back and confirms my injury. Rung me up just to realize he mentioned through conversation of the appliance he thought I was asking of. Which I corrected him and pointed out and literally touched again the same appliances that I wanted. Apparently some way some how after all this confusion. They magically had sold out. So my thinking leads me to believe the person I spoke to on the phone didn't bother to check or maybe something with system either way wasted my time and here's the kicker the way the guy tried to put it was like I could go to another home depot after I already paid. Luckily my bank released this debit transaction. Poor poor salesmanship and somewhere along the line communication is lacking. I hope I can revisit this location in the future without this issue.

name: Brent Jennings
text: Great place to get your gardening supplies early picked up some tomato plants today I was surprised they already had them available

The young lady who brought out the order was superb!  So friendly and a breath of fresh air!  I actually feel bad because I lost the receipt and cannot remember her name so I could go back and submit a survey to help her employer see her worth.  If I get back there and she is there, I will make it a point to find out her name and then submit a survey for her.

text: For the most part they have what you need just keep in mind do not rely on finding help ..to find what you need you literally have to look through several aisles to find anyone that works there. I also had to deal with one employee who had a very smart aleck attitude I almost told her just walk away it was that bad. Sometimes the clearance item priced stuff is phenomenal sometimes it's not a deal at all. The return warranty is a huge problem they want to make you pay a checkout fee for a broken item even if it comes back as broken and needs to be replaced they still want you to pay $35 diagnostics fee this is totally wrong on every level. I actually purchased a pressure washer could not get it to work they sent it off come back and said there was nothing wrong with it I said let's go to the garden center let's hook it up to hose and let's find out ..so finally they agreed after I insisted guess what it didn't work they still wanted $35. The extended warranty is 100% a joke it's just a way to steal money.

name: Robyn Curry
text:
**EDIT**
Since the freezer mishap below the management staff (namely Dave) has gone above and beyond to make things right by me. I feel like The Home Depot has redeemed themselves and they have earned my business once again.

I ordered an upright freezer to be delivered to my home. I missed three days of work for no-show deliveries and countless hours on the phone trying to get a freezer delivered and all I got in return was excuses and finger pointing. I had three managers from the West Mobile location involved in this situation (Dave, Cameron, and Jonathan) as well as the customer service help line. They were all aware of the fiasco that had occurred with this delivery yet when I asked what could be done no solution was offered. After a month of no freezer from the Home Depot I cancelled the order and bought one from Lowe’s. I had it the very next day. The Home Depot was always my go-to home improvement store but in light of the lack of customer service in this particular situation I think I’ll reconsider that.

name: Shaun Steffensen
text:
If you order appliances from somewhere, do yourself a favor and not order from Home Depot. First, the people who are selling the appliances do not know much about them. I was told that for installation of my microwave, I needed an outlet in the wall that it was being installed on. Great. I'm good. WRONG!!! The outlet had to be above the microwave.... Something that would have been nice to know, but they could not communicate that properly.
Then, the delivery/installation people had no idea what they were doing. They were more of a delivery company, not an installation professional. They could not install my gas range. They damaged my microwave. So, really, they weren't even a good delivery company. Home Depot just subs out delivery to the cheapest company....and you can see the quality when your damaged items arrive!
And I pray for you if you have ANY problems with your delivery or installation!!!
Count on a couple of things: 1) You will spend hours on the phone getting to talk to the right person. Once you think that you have the right person, they will tell you they have to check on something and they will have to call you back. OR, the right person is "on lunch" and they will call you back. After giving them ample time for "lunch" (3 hours) when you call them back, you will be told that they were "off today" but they will return your call in the morning.
Basically, it's a game of ping-pong and it takes days to get simple questions answered because, obviously, no one who works there wants to actually do anything.
I can't believe I dropped over $7K in there and they can't even answer a simple question!!!!
Buyer beware!!! Shop at Lowe's!!!

text: I ordered $1,600 worth of appliances on black Friday to furnish my investment property. I scheduled them to be delivered on Friday, 12/22, and I was told the delivery time frame would be from 2pm-6pm. I planned accordingly and the my appliances were never delivered! No CALL or anything. It took me 4 different phone calls to reach an actual person. The delivery people could not be reached. I waited at the property until 10pm. I went to the store the next day and spoke with the manager, and apparently I was the 3rd customer complaining of no delivery and no notification. The store could not reach the delivery service because they were closed, and would not re-open again until that Tuesday after Christmas. I was told they "might" start calling customers then to attempt to re-schedule deliveries. I found this to be completely unprofessional and unacceptable. I cancelled my order and was refunded my money. I am showing my rental Wednesday and it will be empty. Home Depot has hurt my business.

name: Manda McGuff
text: Unfortunately I had been shopping with lowes. It had been on more than occasions than not a terrible experience. I decided to try Home Depot in my recent purchase of a bathtub. Within the first 5 minutes of being inside the store I was greeted by 4 associates. All of which were very welcoming and friendly none of which I have ever experienced at lowes. They pointed me in the direction I needed to go. Upon my arrival of the bath tub isles another associate was there eager and ready to assist me. He opened the merchandise and checked for defects and everything to my satisfaction. None of which I have ever experienced at lowes. Even on the way to check out associates asked if there was anything more they could do to help. Overall my experience at Home Depot was outstanding. I work in customer service and a lot of places lack in that department. Job well done!
